name: Pretty Flying Bullet
description:
You are the bullet.
Your life is movement.
Your movement is lethal.
You have a mission that requires lethality.
They want to take our world.
Do not let them.

How to play

  • The bullet always flies (pretty).
  • Maneuver over obstacles to find out the truth about the world.
  • Destroy all green cubes. Everyone loves to destroy green cubes.

Controls

  • WASD - bullet turn.
  • Space - turbo boost. 
  • R - last checkpoint respawn.
  • F - align rotation.
  • Esc - quit game.

Credits
